resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent ultrices congue rutrum. Phasellus elementum ipsum ac convallis aliquam. Suspendisse eleifend eros a enim faucibus mollis. Nunc placerat, est vitae vestibulum blandit, dolor diam fringilla tellus, eu euismod mauris neque at neque.

{ \"statusCode\": \"000000\", \"desc\": \"请求成功\", \"result\": { \"plantList\": [ { \"area\": \"大部分地区\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick14601451898319.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Haworthia，cymbiformis，fvariegata\", \"name\": \"凝脂菊\", \"plantID\": 15 }, { \"area\": \"原产地位于南非及美国部分沿海地区\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick86391450429419.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Oscularia pedunculata\", \"name\": \"白凤菊\", \"plantID\": 27 }, { \"area\": \"原产美国东部地区，我国客地庭园常见栽培，供观赏\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick90701447235657.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Rudbeckia hirta L.\", \"name\": \"黑心菊\", \"plantID\": 33 }, { \"area\": \"加拿大及美国\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick6651448444908.jpg\", \"engName\": f.\", \"name\": \"粉花绣线菊\", \"plantID\": 102 }, { \"area\": \"原产美国南部\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick58161445591297.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Coreopsis\", \"name\": \"金鸡菊\", \"plantID\": 114 }, { \"area\": \"德国的山坡、田野、水畔、路边、房前屋后到处都有它的踪迹。\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick70311441619512.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Centaurea cyanus L.\", \"name\": \"矢车菊\", \"plantID\": 124 }, { \"area\": \"原产于澳大利亚，在东南亚和欧美栽培较广\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick76241448961739.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Helichrysum bracteatum\", \"name\": \"蜡菊\", \"plantID\": 143 }, { \"area\": \"\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick17501448445669.jpg\", \"engName\": \"pot marigold\", \"name\": \"金盏菊\", \"plantID\": 150 }, { \"area\": \"原产于墨西哥\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick55151448876793.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Cosmos sulphureus\", \"name\": \"硫华菊\", \"plantID\": 182 }, { \"area\": \"原产大西洋加那利群岛，中国各地公园或庭院广泛栽培。\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick80281450344632.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Florists Cineraria\", \"name\": \"瓜叶菊\", \"plantID\": 197 }, { \"area\": \"原产北美，中国中、南部广为栽培\", \"coverURL\": \"http://img.boqiicdn.com/Data/BK/P/imagick70211446543088.jpg\", \"engName\": \"Gaillardia Pulchella Foug.\", \"name\": \"天人菊\", \"plantID\": 224 }, { \"area\":
